welcome: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock.
name_intro: You'll be playing against Ember. Ember isn't very good at this game, see if you can beat her!
game_rules: Remember, scissors cuts paper, paper covers rock, rock crushes lizard, lizard poisons Spock, Spock smashes scissors, scissors decapitates lizard, lizard eats paper, paper disproves Spock, Spock vaporizes rock, and as it always has, rock crushes scissors.
match_rules: First one to three wins takes the match!
win:
You chose {choice}, Ember chose {computer_choice}
You won! Ember is considering renaming herself to Spark
lose:
You chose {choice}, Ember chose {computer_choice}
Aww, you lost! Ember thinks it's time she became Flame
tie:
You chose {choice}, Ember chose {computer_choice}
It's a tie! Ember wants to play again!
user_match_winner: You won the match! Ember is now, begrudgingly, Spark
computer_match_winner: Aw, you lost! Ember changed her name to Blaze!
replay: Do you want to play Ember again? Enter 'y' or 'n'!
